definition.text: News-flash about the Time Frame Scale: there is no automatic mode!

paragraphs.text: You may freely toggle through all available time frames! In descending order: 24, 8, 6, 4, 3, 2, and 1 hours, and 45, 40, 30, 20, 15, 10, 5, 4, 3, 2, and 1 minutes.

Beware when you switch the time frame scale to lower time frames! Dropping time frames too fast and without adjusting the time scale may cause too much information to be rendered on-screen at a time, slowing down your computer. How much information density your hardware may handle depends on its CPU and GPU performance.
